name: Towers
description:
Towers is a VR-only puzzle game. Navigate through 3D mazes by twisting pieces of the tower.

Towers is simple to learn, but very difficult to master. Use your 3D spatial reasoning to navigate the ball through the tower in as few moves as possible.

Towers features 50+ puzzles to solve, spanning a variety of shapes and sizes.

Towers was built from the ground up for VR and supports playing room-scale, standing, and sitting.
